articles.description: Study finds 54 days after discharge, 69% of patients still had fatigue, and 53% were suffering from persistent breathlessness.

articles.title: School closed as ‘significant’ number of pupils self-isolate - STV News
articles.description: Cases of coronavirus identified at Moray school, which shuts until Monday.
articles.content:
Investigations into deaths in police custody should be treated with the same urgency as homicide investigations, according to an independent review.
